item.description:
This group has been specially formed for entertainers and professionals actively involved in the entertainment industry. Artists, writers, filmmakers, musicians, please come and share your ideas, questions and concerns with other like-minded professionals and receive valuable advice.

This month, I'd like to bring in a guest speaker/industry professional to address some specific concerns of our members. Thus, I need everyone's participation! This group is here to help YOU, the creatives and professionals of entertainment, to have rewarding and successful careers. If have have a specific question, concern or interest you would like to present to a music industry professional, please email it to me soon at sjamieson@exemplarlaw.com. I will need a list of questions in the next week or so, so I can see what direction our conversation will go in and inform our guest accordingly. Guest still TBD, so stay tuned!
item.name: Revolve Nation Entertainment Roundtable & Networking Group
